product.title: Utopia White Vertical Blind
product.description: The sharpness of white is softened by a subtle woven texture to this clean, bright fabric, which dazzles with its classy simplicity. Combine that with the robust practicality of a vertical blind and you have a versatile window covering thatll bring luminosity to any space.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.
